results.name: Self-inverse permutation of nonnegative integers, "blue-gray" code: a(n) = A003188(A193231(n)).
link: Antti Karttunen, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..8191
Joerg Arndt, Matters Computational (The Fxtbook), section 1.19 "Invertible transforms on words", pp. 49--55 [Cf. especially the identity 1.19-9d: gB = Bg^{-1} given on page 53].
Index entries for sequences that are permutations of the natural numbers
program: def a(n): return n if n<2 else a003188(a193231(n)) # _Indranil Ghosh_, Jun 05 2017
